name: Écid LLor
description:
A strategical resource management turn-based reverse tower defense game with dice.

MAKE SURE THAT YOU PLAY THE TUTORIAL

Click Tutorial in the top left corner of the game

No need for constructive criticism, I just do this for fun, and am not an aspiring game developer. I know there are many flaws in the game, so no worries. Enjoy what I managed to build in the 2 day time limit!

Made by: Mason Reck and Greyson Rose
